name: Synrio
tagline: View Synechocystis 6803 chromosome using R and Shiny
body:
#synrio

A simple R and SHINY package based interface to analyze and visualize synchocystis genome

#Requirement:

Shiny package installed in R

library(shiny)
Run a tar or zip file directly

runUrl("https://github.com/NFMC/synrio/archive/master.tar.gz") runUrl("https://github.com/NFMC/synrio/archive/master.zip")

Or you can clone the git repository, then use runApp():

# Library dependencies

shiny, graph, Rgraphviz, shinyBS, circlize, Biostrings, shinyIncubator, seqLogo
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
